topics.body:
I was looking at the famous gendo pose.
!https://derpicdn.net/img/view/2015/2/25/836970__safe_solo_pinkie+pie_looking+at+you_glasses_glare_rainbow+power_slit+eyes_gendo+pose_nightmare+pinkie.jpg!

And then I notice how when I have a problem answering a difficult question, I would do this pose, close my eyes and breathe calmly. A few minutes later, I am able to answer the question.
